Mail Perspectives extends Mail,s user interface to tame window chaos and make it easier to monitor your important mail and mailboxes. Use Mail Act-On to create rules to perform action on messages by responding to simple keystrokes. Create Outbox rules to automatically add headers and set the archive mailboxes of sent mail. Letter Opener 9.2.1 – Open Winmail.dat, MSG and XPS files with just a double-click.

A winmail.dat file is an email from Microsoft Outlook that can not be read by other email applications. It needs to be converted for the content to be accessible. Letter Opener does that with a simple double-click! With 10 years experience (and a special dislike for winmail.dat files) we made sure that working together with… Read More »

MailHub for El Capitan 1.9.2P3 – Maintain a streamlined inbox in Apple Mail.

MailHub for El Capitan is a time-saving email management plugin that can file, delete, or enact actions on emails without leaving your inbox. Email from a contact or thread can be batch-filed to a mailbox (or deleted) with a series of simple mouse clicks or key strokes, radically reducing time spent on mail administration. MailBar 1.1.5 – Manage your Mail.app inbox from the menu bar.

MailBar enables you to check your inbox and manage your emails directly from your Mac,s status bar. The light and discreet application is designed to run in the background and display the number of new emails next to its menu bar icon. Thanks to MailBar, you can monitor and manage up to four different mailboxes.… Read More »
